medical_conditions.description: 60% have no medical condition (8 None values for every 1 condition from list)

name_suffixes.description: ~67% have no suffix (8 empty strings for every 1 suffix from list)

middle_initials.description: ~18% have no middle initial (4 empty strings for every 1 initial from list)

hire_date.description: Default hire date range 2013-2022, recent_hire_bias=0 means uniform distribution

executive.description: VP, Chief, CFO, CTO, CEO, General Counsel level positions

senior.description: Senior, Manager, Director, Lead level positions
